price: 18. Y si alguno llega a escuchar algo, es perseguido por una estrella fugaz (que lo destruye).
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā mani is'taraqa al-samʿa fa-atbaʿahu shihābun mubīnun
